body:
This adds a compiler class to recognize oneapi as distinct from retro Intel compilers. Example compiler stanza:
```- compiler:
    spec: oneapi@2020.09.15.001
    paths:
      cc: icx 
      cxx: icpx
      f77: ifx
      fc: ifx
    flags: {}
    operating_system: opensuse_leap15
    target: x86_64
    modules:
    - /hidden/because/of/NDA
    environment:
      prepend_path:
        LD_LIBRARY_PATH:  /hidden/because/of/NDA 
      unset: []
    extra_rpaths: [] ```
title: Oneapi add compiler
